md:
giải nghĩa từ "lengthy" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Lengthy (adjective) - Dài, kéo dài, lâu dài

Meaning: Taking a long time to do or complete; not short.

Example sentence: The lengthy process of applying for a visa took several weeks.

Related words: long, prolonged, extended, time-consuming.

* Lengthy (adjective) - Rườm rà, dài dòng, lan man

Meaning: Containing too many words or details; not concise.

Example sentence: The lengthy report was full of unnecessary information.

Related words: verbose, wordy, prolix, rambling.

Note: The two meanings of "lengthy" are related but distinct. The first meaning refers to the duration of time, while the second meaning refers to the quantity of words or details.
